[The Regulatory Genomics and Bioinformatics Laboratory](http://liigh.unam.mx/amedina/) is focused on designing and developing bioinformatic approaches to unravel and study genomic regulatory mechanisms, with a strong emphasis on identifying genetic variants that could disrupt such mechanisms.
